ConfigParam.Description: translate("#LDS#List of target system charts and heatmaps on the governance start page")
translate("#LDS#Visibility of Access Governance - Target systems overview")

ConfigEntry.ConfigEntryObject: <Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>AttestationOpenCasesBySystemEntitlement</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} accounts, {1} pending membership attestation case(s)", SizeValue ,ColorValue,ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Pending membership attestation cases")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>DataCaption("UnsAccount")</SizeValueTerm></Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>UserAccountsHavingRiskGreaterXByDomain</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} user accounts, {1} of which having risk index above threshold", SizeValue ,ColorValue,ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><Title>format(DisplayName, RedLimit)</Title><FilterByObject>False</FilterByObject><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><EqualSized>true</EqualSized><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><DashboardDefMonthly>UserAccountsHavingRiskGreaterXByDomainMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>UserAccountsHavingRiskGreaterXByDomainYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#User accounts having risk above threshold")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#User accounts")</SizeValueTerm><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#{1}: user accounts with risk index above threshold {2} by {0}", abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"))</TooltipHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric></Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>EntitlementsHavingRiskGreaterXByDomain</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} entitlements, {1} of which having risk index above threshold", SizeValue ,ColorValue,ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><Title>format(DisplayName, RedLimit)</Title><FilterByObject>False</FilterByObject><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><EqualSized>true</EqualSized><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><DashboardDefMonthly>EntitlementsHavingRiskGreaterXByDomainMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>EntitlementsHavingRiskGreaterXByDomainYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#User accounts having risk above threshold")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#User accounts")</SizeValueTerm><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#{1}: entitlements with risk index above threshold {2} by {0}", abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"))</TooltipHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric></Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>EntitlementsHavingRiskGreaterXByDepartment</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} entitlements, {1} of which having risk index above threshold", SizeValue ,ColorValue,ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><Title>format(DisplayName, RedLimit)</Title><FilterByObject>False</FilterByObject><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><EqualSized>true</EqualSized><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><DashboardDefMonthly>EntitlementsHavingRiskGreaterXByDepartmentMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>EntitlementsHavingRiskGreaterXByDepartmentYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#User accounts having risk above threshold")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#User accounts")</SizeValueTerm><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#{1}: entitlements with risk index above threshold {2} by {0}", abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"))</TooltipHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric></Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>UNSRootWithWithoutAccProduct</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} entitlements and {1}% without service item", SizeValue ,numformat(ColorValue, '0'),ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><Title>translate("#LDS#Entitlements w/o service item")</Title><FilterByObject>False</FilterByObject><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><EqualSized>false</EqualSized><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><DashboardDefMonthly>none</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>none</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimit>10.00</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><YellowLimit>5</YellowLimit><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Percentage of entitlements without service item")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Entitlements")</SizeValueTerm></Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>UNSGroupWithWithoutAccount_By_UNSGroup</DisplayName><ControlType>ChartPie</ControlType><ClickMode>clickglobal</ClickMode><RpsReport>Groups without account assignments</RpsReport><Title>translate("#LDS#System entitlements by user account assignments")</Title></Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>UNSGroupWithWithoutAccount_BY_UNSRoot</DisplayName><Title>translate('#LDS#Groups with / without user account')</Title><ClickMode>clickglobal</ClickMode><ControlType>ChartPie</ControlType><RpsReport>Groups without account assignments</RpsReport></Object>

ConfigEntry.Value:
sqland(sqlcompareuid("uid_person", variable("%useruid%")),
"uid_person in (select uid_person from personinaerole where uid_aerole in ('CAP-AEROLE-IAG-CISO', 'CAP-AEROLE-AUDITING-AUDITOR') union all select piae.uid_person from personinaerole piae join aerolecollection aec on aec.uid_aerole = piae.uid_aerole where aec.UID_ParentAERole = 'TSB-AEROLE-NAMESPACEADMIN')")
